params.betId: The ID of the bet to claim

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.priceMaxs: Array of maximum prices in BPS
params.priceMins: Array of minimum prices in BPS

params.targetTimestamp: The target timestamp for the prediction

returns._0: betId The ID of the placed bet

returns.processedCount: Number of bets processed in this batch
returns.winningWeight: Total winning weight added in this batch

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

arePricesSetForBucket(uint256).notice: Check if all timestamps in a bucket have prices set

claimBet(uint256).notice: Claim winnings for a finalized bet (only after aggregation complete)

getBatchInfo(uint256).notice: Get batch processing info for a bucket

getPriceAtTimestamp(uint256).notice: Get price for a specific timestamp

getSharpnessMultiplier(uint256,uint256).notice: Compute sharpness multiplier based on price range width

getTimeMultiplier(uint256).notice: Compute time multiplier based on lead time

placeBatchBets(uint256[],uint256[],uint2.notice: Place multiple bets in a single transaction

processBatch(uint256).notice: Process next batch of bets for a bucket (anyone can call)

setPriceForTimestamp(uint256,uint256).notice: Set price for a single timestamp (only owner)

setPricesForTimestamps(uint256[],uint256.notice: Set prices for multiple timestamps at once (only owner)
